long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hello there !
With all this Trump hoopla going around, Alan and Bonny decided to have some fun. Download this extension in your friends chrome and wait as he loses patience, when he sees all his images changed to Trump, on his facebook wall, google images, twitter feed and every website he holds dear :)

To disable, just go to Extensions and disable the extension.

Now go on, Trump your friend !
